## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New component (non-breaking new feature)

## Component Checklist
- [ ] TypeScript types are fully defined (no `any`)
- [ ] Component is accessible (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
- [ ] Responsive design (works on mobile, tablet, desktop)
- [ ] Dark mode support
- [ ] Reduced motion support
- [ ] JSDoc comments on props
- [ ] Example/showcase page added to `app/`
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Code follows style guide (no semicolons, single quotes, DRY)
- [ ] Tested in Chrome, Firefox, Safari
